00032 LaAnimalParameter::LaAnimalParameter() : LaSerialisable(), LaGuid()
00033 {
00034   setGuid();
00035   mName="No Name Set";
00036   mDescription="Not Set";
00037 }

00044 LaAnimalParameter::LaAnimalParameter(const LaAnimalParameter& theAnimalParameter)
00045 {
00046   mName=theAnimalParameter.name();
00047   mDescription=theAnimalParameter.description();
00048   setGuid(theAnimalParameter.guid());
00049   setAnimalGuid(theAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00050   mPercentTameMeat=theAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00051   mValueSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand();
00052   mValueCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueCommonGrazingLand();
00053   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00054   mEnergyType = theAnimalParameter.energyType();
00055   mFodderUse = theAnimalParameter.fodderUse();
00056   mFoodSourceMap = theAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00057 
00058     // fodder stuff here
00059 
00060   mUseSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand();
00061   mUseCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand();
00062   mFallowUsage = theAnimalParameter.fallowUsage();
00063   mRasterName = theAnimalParameter.rasterName();
00064 }

00066 LaAnimalParameter& LaAnimalParameter::operator=(const LaAnimalParameter& theAnimalParameter)
00067 {
00068   if (this == &theAnimalParameter) return *this;     // Gracefully handle self assignment
00069 
00070   mName=theAnimalParameter.name();
00071   mDescription=theAnimalParameter.description();
00072   setGuid(theAnimalParameter.guid());
00073   setAnimalGuid(theAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00074   mPercentTameMeat = theAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat();
00075   mValueSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueSpecificGrazingLand();
00076   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00077   mValueCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.ValueCommonGrazingLand();
00078   mUseSpecificGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand();
00079   mUseCommonGrazingLand = theAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand();
00080   mAreaUnits = theAnimalParameter.areaUnits();
00081   mEnergyType = theAnimalParameter.energyType();
00082   mFodderUse = theAnimalParameter.fodderUse();
00083   mFoodSourceMap = theAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00084 
00085     // fodder stuff here
00086 
00087   mFallowUsage = theAnimalParameter.fallowUsage();
00088   mRasterName = theAnimalParameter.rasterName();
00089   return *this;
00090 }

00224 bool LaAnimalParameter::fromXml(QString theXml)
00225 {
00226     //qDebug("Loading animal parameter from xml");
00227   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00228   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00229   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("animalParameter");
00230   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00231   {
00232       //TODO - just make this a warning
00233      //qDebug("top element could not be found!");
00234   }
00235     //qDebug("AnimalParameter::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00236   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00237     //qDebug("AnimalParameter::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00238   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00239   mDescription=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("description").text());
00240   mAnimalGuid=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("animal").text());
00241   mPercentTameMeat=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("percentTameMeat").text()).toFloat();
00242   mUseCommonGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useCommonGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00243   mUseSpecificGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("useSpecificGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00244   mValueCommonGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00245   mValueSpecificGrazingLand=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand").text()).toInt();
00246     //  //  //  //  ///
00247     //mAreaUnits=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00248   QString myAreaUnits = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("areaUnits").text());
00249   if (myAreaUnits == "Dunum")
00250   {
00251     mAreaUnits=Dunum;
00252   }
00253   else if (myAreaUnits == "Hectare")
00254   {
00255     mAreaUnits=Hectare;
00256   }
00257   QString myEnergyType = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("energyType").text());
00258   if (myEnergyType == "KCalories")
00259   {
00260     mEnergyType=KCalories;
00261   }
00262   else if (myEnergyType == "TDN")
00263   {
00264     mEnergyType=TDN;
00265   }
00266   mFodderUse=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fodderUse").text()).toInt();
00267     // populate the fodder map
00268   mFoodSourceMap.clear();
00269   QDomNodeList myFodderCropsList = myDocument.elementsByTagName("fodderCrop");
00270   for (int myCounter=0; myCounter < myFodderCropsList.size(); myCounter++)
00271   {
00272     QDomNode myFoodSourceNode = myFodderCropsList.item(myCounter);
00273     QDomElement myFoodSourceElement = myFoodSourceNode.toElement();
00274 
00275       // load the data from the xml into local variables
00276     QString myCropGuid = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderCropGuid").text();
00277     int myFodderStrawChaff = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderStrawChaff").text().toInt();
00278     int myGrain = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderGrain").text().toInt();
00279     int myUsed = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderUse").text().toInt();
00280     int myDays = myFoodSourceElement.firstChildElement("fodderDays").text().toInt();
00281     LaFoodSource myFoodSource;
00282 
00283       // setup the data to insert into the map
00284     myFoodSource.setFodder(myFodderStrawChaff);
00285     myFoodSource.setGrain(myGrain);
00286     myFoodSource.setDays(myDays);
00287     myFoodSource.setUsed(myUsed);
00288     myFoodSource.setCropGuid(myCropGuid);
00289       // insert data into map
00290     mFoodSourceMap.insert(myCropGuid,myFoodSource);
00291   }   // end of for loop
00292    //qDebug("Number of food sources restored from xml: " + QString::number(mFoodSourceMap.count()).toLocal8Bit());
00293 
00294   QString myFallowUsage = QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("fallowUsage").text());
00295   if (myFallowUsage == "High")
00296   {
00297     mFallowUsage=High;
00298   }
00299   else if (myFallowUsage == "Medium")
00300   {
00301     mFallowUsage=Medium;
00302   }
00303   else if (myFallowUsage == "Low")
00304   {
00305     mFallowUsage=Low;
00306   }
00307   else
00308   {
00309     mFallowUsage=None;
00310   }
00311   mRasterName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("rasterName").text());
00312   return true;
00313 }
00314 
00315 QString LaAnimalParameter::toXml()
00316 {
00317   QString myString;
00318 
00319   myString+=QString("<animalParameter guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00320   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00321   myString+=QString("  <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "</description>\n");
00322   myString+=QString("  <animal>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mAnimalGuid) + "</animal>\n");
00323   myString+=QString("  <percentTameMeat>" + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "</percentTameMeat>\n");
00324   myString+=QString("  <useCommonGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "</useCommonGrazingLand>\n");
00325   myString+=QString("  <useSpecificGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "</useSpecificGrazingLand>\n");  myString+=QString("  <foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "</foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand>\n");
00326   myString+=QString("  <foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand>" + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "</foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand>\n");
00327 
00328   switch (mAreaUnits)
00329   {
00330     case Dunum:
00331       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Dunum</areaUnits>\n");
00332       break;
00333     case Hectare:
00334       myString+=QString("  <areaUnits>Hectare</areaUnits>\n");
00335       break;
00336   }
00337 
00338   switch (mEnergyType)
00339   {
00340     case KCalories:
00341       myString+=QString("  <energyType>KCalories</energyType>\n");
00342       break;
00343     case TDN:
00344       myString+=QString("  <energyType>TDN</energyType\n");
00345       break;
00346   }
00347 
00348   myString+=QString("  <fodderUse>"+ QString::number(mFodderUse) +"</fodderUse>\n");
00349 
00350   if (mFodderUse)
00351   {
00352 
00353      //qDebug("Fodder is used");
00354     myString+=QString("   <fodderCrops>\n");
00355       // write out the map for fodder info to xml
00356     QMapIterator<QString, LaFoodSource> myIterator(mFoodSourceMap);
00357     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00358     {
00359       myIterator.next();
00360       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myIterator.value();
00361 
00362       QString myGuid = myIterator.key();
00363       QString myFodderStrawChaff = QString::number(myFoodSource.fodder());
00364       QString myFodderGrain = QString::number(myFoodSource.grain());
00365       QString myFodderDays = QString::number(myFoodSource.days());
00366       myString+=QString("    <fodderCrop>\n");
00367       myString+=QString("      <fodderCropGuid>" + myGuid + "</fodderCropGuid>\n");
00368       myString+=QString("      <fodderStrawChaff>" + myFodderStrawChaff + "</fodderStrawChaff>\n");
00369       myString+=QString("      <fodderGrain>"+ myFodderGrain + "</fodderGrain>\n");
00370       myString+=QString("      <fodderDays>"+ myFodderDays + "</fodderDays>\n");
00371       myString+=QString("    </fodderCrop>\n");
00372     }
00373     myString+=QString("   </fodderCrops>\n");
00374   }
00375   else
00376   {
00377      //qDebug("Fodder is not used");
00378   }
00379 
00380   switch (mFallowUsage)
00381   {
00382     case  High:
00383       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>High</fallowUsage>\n");
00384       break;
00385     case  Medium:
00386       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>Medium</fallowUsage>\n");
00387       break;
00388     case  Low:
00389       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage>Low</fallowUsage>\n");
00390       break;
00391     default:
00392       myString+=QString("  <fallowUsage></fallowUsage>\n");
00393       break;
00394   }   //switch
00395   myString+=QString("  <rasterName>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "</RasterName>\n");
00396   myString+=QString("</animalParameter>\n");
00397   return myString;
00398 }

00400 QString LaAnimalParameter::toText()
00401 {
00402   QString myString;
00403 
00404   myString+=QString("guid=>" + guid() + "\n");
00405   myString+=QString("name=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "\n");
00406   myString+=QString("description=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mDescription) + "\n");
00407   myString+=QString("animal=>" + mAnimalGuid + "\n");
00408   myString+=QString("percentTameMeat=>" + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "\n");
00409   myString+=QString("useCommonGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "\n");
00410   myString+=QString("useSpecificGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "\n");
00411   myString+=QString("foodValueOfCommonGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "\n");
00412   myString+=QString("foodValueOfSpecificGrazingLand=>" + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "\n");
00413   myString+=QString("areaUnits=>" + QString::number(mAreaUnits) + "\n");
00414   myString+=QString("energyType=>" + QString::number(mEnergyType) + "\n");
00415   myString+=QString("fodderUse=>" + QString::number(mFodderUse) + "\n");
00416 
00417   if (mFodderUse)
00418   {
00419       // write out the map for fodder info to text
00420   }
00421   else
00422   {
00423     myString+="Fodder not used";
00424   }
00425 
00426   myString+=QString("fallowUsage=>" + QString::number(mFallowUsage) + "\n");
00427   myString+=QString("rasterName=>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "\n");
00428   return myString;
00429 }

00431 QString LaAnimalParameter::toHtml()
00432 {
00433   QString myString;
00434   QString myFallowUsage;
00435   switch (mFallowUsage)
00436   {
00437     case  High:
00438       myFallowUsage=QString("High Priority");
00439       break;
00440     case  Medium:
00441       myFallowUsage=QString("Medium Priority");
00442       break;
00443     case  Low:
00444       myFallowUsage=QString("Low Priority");
00445       break;
00446     default:
00447       myFallowUsage=QString("None");
00448       break;
00449   }
00450 
00451   myString+="<h3 >Details for " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
00452   myString+="<table>";
00453     //myString+="<tr><td>GUID:</th><td>" + guid() + "</td></tr>";
00454   myString+="<tr><td>Description:</td><td>" + mDescription + "</td></tr>";
00455     //myString+="<tr><td>Animal:</td><td>" + mAnimalGuid + "</td></tr>";
00456   myString+="<tr><td>Raster Mask:</td><td>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mRasterName) + "</td></tr>";
00457   myString+="<tr><td>Percentage of Tame Meat:</td><td> " + QString::number(mPercentTameMeat) + "</td></tr>";
00458   myString+="<tr><td>Use Common Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mUseCommonGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00459   myString+="<tr><td>Use Specific Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mUseSpecificGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00460   myString+="<tr><td>Food Value Of Common Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mValueCommonGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00461   myString+="<tr><td>Food Value Of Specific Grazing Land:</td><td> " + QString::number(mValueSpecificGrazingLand) + "</td></tr>";
00462   myString+="<tr><td>Energy Type:</td><td> "+ QString::number(mEnergyType) + "</td></tr>";
00463   myString+="<tr><td>Area Units:</td><td> "+ QString::number(mAreaUnits) + "</td></tr>";
00464 
00465 
00466   if (myFallowUsage=="None")
00467   {
00468     myString+="<tr><td>No Fallow Grazing</td></tr>";
00469   }
00470   else
00471   {
00472     myString+="<tr><td>Fallow Grazing:</td><td>" + myFallowUsage + "</td></tr>";
00473   }
00474   if (mFodderUse)
00475   {
00476     myString+=QString("   <fodderCrops>\n");
00477       // write out the map for fodder info to xml
00478     int myCounter = 0;
00479     QMapIterator<QString, LaFoodSource> myIterator(mFoodSourceMap);
00480     while (myIterator.hasNext())
00481     {
00482       myIterator.next();
00483       myCounter++;
00484       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myIterator.value();
00485 
00486       QString myGuid = myIterator.key();
00487       QString myFodderStrawChaff = QString::number(myFoodSource.fodder());
00488       QString myFodderGrain = QString::number(myFoodSource.grain());
00489       QString myFodderDays = QString::number(myFoodSource.days());
00490 
00491       myString+="<tr><td>Fodder Source #:</td><td> " + QString::number(myCounter) + "</td></tr>";
00492       myString+="<tr><td>Crop Guid: "+ myGuid + "</td></tr>";
00493       myString+="<tr><td>Straw and Chaff: "+ myFodderStrawChaff + "</td></tr>";
00494       myString+="<tr><td>Grain: "+ myFodderGrain + "</td></tr>";
00495       myString+="<tr><td>Days: "+ myFodderDays + "</td></tr>";
00496     }
00497   }
00498   else
00499   {
00500     myString+="<tr><td>Fodder not used</td><td>";
00501   }
00502 
00503   myString+="</table>";
00504   return myString;
00505 }
